Detect messages when they are added to the chat HUD.

Detect messages when they are added to the chat HUD, but ignore messages with unrecognized tags.

Designed for compatibility with the ChatPatches mod.
Detect messages when they received by the packet handler.
If ChatNotify is not detecting messages, try changing this.
option.chatnotify.global.notif_mode.stat: Activate all matching notifications, play all sounds.
Activate all matching notifications, but only play the sound from the first notification.
Only activate the first matching notification.
option.chatnotify.global.prefix.list.too:
A prefix is a character or command that you type before a chat message to modify it.

For example, '!' or '/shout' may be used on some servers to communicate in global chat.

This may be useful for preventing spurious notifications.
option.chatnotify.global.restyle_mode.st: Restyle all instances of the first matching trigger.
Only restyle the first instance of the first matching trigger.
option.chatnotify.global.self_notify.too:
If ON, messages detected as sent by you will be able to trigger notifications.

This can be overridden by individual notifications.
option.chatnotify.global.send_mode.statu: Response messages will be sent via the packet handler.
Response messages will be sent via a simulated chat screen.
option.chatnotify.global.send_mode.toolt: If response messages are not sending as expected, try changing this.
option.chatnotify.global.sender_detectio: ChatHeads will be used to identify the message sender if possible, otherwise the 'Sent message match' heuristic will be used.
Incoming messages will be identified as sent by you if they match a recently-sent message and match a trigger of the first notification.
option.chatnotify.notif.click_edit:
Click to edit.
Right-click to toggle.
option.chatnotify.notif.exclusion.list.t: This notification will not be activated if ANY of the triggers from the list below match the message.
option.chatnotify.notif.format.list.tool: Controls the color and format of message text restyled by notifications.
option.chatnotify.notif.inclusion.list.t: This notification will not be activated unless ALL of the triggers in the list below match the message.
option.chatnotify.notif.list.tooltip: A notification will be activated when an incoming chat message matches one of the notification's triggers.
option.chatnotify.notif.misc.msg.replace: Replaces the chat message that triggered the notification.
option.chatnotify.notif.misc.msg.status_: Displayed above the hotbar for a few seconds.
option.chatnotify.notif.misc.msg.title: Title message
option.chatnotify.notif.misc.msg.title.t: Displayed in the middle of the screen for a few seconds.
option.chatnotify.notif.misc.msg.toast.t: Displayed in a toast popup for a few seconds.
option.chatnotify.notif.misc.msg.tooltip: Leave blank to hide the original message.
Leave blank to display the original message.
Use $4, $n etc. (format codes) to customize message style.
Use (1), (2) etc. to access capturing groups from a regex trigger.
option.chatnotify.notif.misc.reset.confi: Are you sure you want to delete all notifications and reset all settings?
option.chatnotify.notif.misc.reset.toolt: Delete all notifications and reset all settings.
option.chatnotify.notif.response.command: Example: If the keybind is [B] or [LEFT CONTROL + B], this should be 'key.keyboard.b'.
Example: If the keybind is [LEFT CONTROL + B], this should be 'key.keyboard.left.control'. If the keybind is [B] this should be 'key.keyboard.unknown'.
option.chatnotify.notif.response.list.to: Chat messages or commands to be sent when this notification is activated.
Warning: Can crash the game, use with caution.
option.chatnotify.notif.response.time.to: Time in ticks to wait (after the previous message, if any) before sending.
option.chatnotify.notif.response.type.CO:
CommandKeys response.
If the CommandKeys mod is loaded (version 2.3.1 or later), this response will trigger all macros with keybinds matching the key IDs you set.
option.chatnotify.notif.response.type.RE:
Regex response.
Use (1), (2) etc in the message to access regex capturing groups from the trigger.
option.chatnotify.notif.sound.source.too: The sound source determines which of Minecraft's volume control sliders will affect the notification sound.
option.chatnotify.notif.trigger.editor.d: Click on a message from the list below
option.chatnotify.notif.trigger.list.too: If a trigger from the list below matches an incoming chat message, this notification will be activated.
option.chatnotify.notif.trigger.selector: Select a key from the list below, or use the trigger editor to view the keys of recent chat messages.
option.chatnotify.notif.trigger.style_ta:
When a trigger matches a message, that part of the message will be automatically restyled.

If you want to restyle a different part of the message instead, specify a style target.

If the provided style target cannot be used, the trigger will be used as normal.

Type: Capturing

To restyle capturing groups from a regex-type trigger, list their indices here.

Example: 1,2,3

Type: Normal

Substring matching.

Not case-sensitive.

Type: Regex

Pure regex pattern-matching.

Use a tool such as regex101.com to build regex patterns.
option.chatnotify.notif.trigger.type.KEY:
Type: Translation Key

Matches messages that have a translation key containing the trigger.

Translation keys of recent messages can be viewed in the trigger editor.
option.chatnotify.notif.trigger.type.NOR:
Type: Normal

Matches messages that contain the trigger by itself (not as part of a word).

Not case-sensitive, allows for symbols including punctuation.
option.chatnotify.notif.trigger.type.REG:
Type: Regex

Pure regex pattern-matching.

Use a tool such as regex101.com to build regex patterns.
option.chatnotify.root.exit_without_savi: Are you sure you want to exit without saving?
This will reload the configuration file to revert any changes you have made. If you have any active responses, they will be stopped.
toast.chatnotify.reset.title: ChatNotify Options Reset - Load Error
ui.chatnotify.field.error.sound: Unrecognized sound. May not work in-game.
